dfs

Interface NameNodeInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NameNode

    public interface NameNodeInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote

      • fileDistributionConfirm

        boolean fileDistributionConfirm(java.lang.String filename)
                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Used by client to acknowledge name node after uploading all the chunks. Then the name node will update correspondence tables.
        Parameters:
        filename - String The name of file uploaded.
        Returns:
        boolean Result of acknowledge.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

                                        int chunkNum,
                                        java.lang.String dataNodeIP)
                                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Remove a chunk from file distribution table.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of file to be removed.
        chunkNum - The chunk number of file to be removed.
        dataNodeIP - The IP address of data node where this chunk is located.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
